---
title: "Motor Control Flashcards"
---

Term: Motor Control
Definition: The study of how humans coordinate and control body movements, including the processes of movement planning, execution, and adaptation.

Term: Movement Production
Definition: The process of initiating, planning, and executing physical movements through the coordinated action of the nervous system and muscles.

Term: Movement Regulation
Definition: The continuous monitoring and adjustment of movements based on sensory feedback to maintain accuracy and achieve desired outcomes.
